overview:
Robin Muilwijk, born in 1969 in the Netherlands where is still lives, is a true Open Source enthusiast! During his years on internet he gradually got more and more involved in Open Source projects. With his blog posts he hopes to bring you interesting news, reviews, case studies and more.

Robin’s previous but also current involvement in Open Source projects is with Joomla! In the past he has been a Core member at the project, and currently he is one of the Forum Administrators and Global Moderators. Robin’s main goal at the forums is to help people in the spirit of true Open Source.
